price: Dhugumatti, sun dhugaadha; (inni) wal mormii warra ibiddaati.
arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahli al-nāri
